name: Xianyun
desc:
"Passerine Herald" Xianyun

Chivalrous Shadow, Shrouded in Cloud.

value.name: They Call Her Cloud Retainer
value.desc:
Xianyun: They Call Her Cloud Retainer

"Stray clouds, converge."

value.text: Reward for inviting Xianyun to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Xianyun
value.desc: One of the Mighty and Illuminated Adepti of Jueyun, known as "Cloud Retainer." Expert in all kinds of mechanical contraptions, her heart now turns towards the affairs of the mortal world, through which she walks under the name "Xianyun."

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> . Creates <color=#ffffff>Skyladder</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Driftcloud Wave</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Skyladder</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When you perform "Switch Character":</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)
<color=#ece5d8>Driftcloud Wave</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When you switch to the character to which this is attached:</color> Deal 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> <color=#80ffd7>DMG</color> . Heals all allied characters for 1 HP. Creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Starwicker</color> in your Hand.
(Characters with Starwicker equipped can use the Technique: <color=#ffffff>Adeptal Assistance</color> )

<color=#ffd780>Equipment Card</color>
Technique: Adeptal Assistance
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>
(A character can only equip 1 technique at a time)

<color=#ffd780>Technique</color>
Heal the attached character for 2 HP. The next time this character uses a Normal Attack, it is considered as a <color=#ffffff>Plunging Attack</color> , DMG +1. Also, after the Skill finalizes, deal <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> .

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Technique</color>
When the active character is equipped with a Technique card, they can use the corresponding Technique.
Using a Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the Technique.
Using a Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.
<color=#ece5d8>Plunging Attack</color>
After a character is switched in to be the Active Character, should their next Combat Action within this Round be a Normal Attack, it will be considered a Plunging Attack for the instance.

customize.name: Xianyun
customize.desc:
"Passerine Herald" Xianyun

Chivalrous Shadow, Shrouded in Cloud.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"One finds this game quite fascinating indeed. Perhaps a few rounds are in order?"
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Xianyun's deck centers around her Elemental Burst. This allows her to heal while enhancing characters' Normal Attacks.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Xianyun
customize.desc:
"Passerine Herald" Xianyun

Chivalrous Shadow, Shrouded in Cloud.

customize.name: Shenhe
customize.desc:
"Lonesome Transcendence" Shenhe

The mortal realm briefly gracing, like a wisp of smoke vanishing.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc:
"Plenilune Gaze" Ganyu

"This press release is due tomorrow… I suppose I could work through the night and get it done.”

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: They Call Her Cloud Retainer
customize.desc:
Xianyun: They Call Her Cloud Retainer

"Stray clouds, converge."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Not bad at all. One had not expected you to be so skilled a player. Such carelessness simply will not do..."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Xianyun" starts with the Talent Card "They Call Her Cloud Retainer" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
